Text.Page:
Talk about a "target-rich environment." We've been trying to push into the deeper levels, but those Blood Guards are tough nuts to crack.

We need some serious -style disruption, in other words.

Take out the {@LinkCreature:33#11#Blood Guard berserkers} and {@LinkCreature:33#61#reapers}. Then we can follow up with a proper advance.
Victory for Valkyon! I'll prepare the troops to seize the lower floors.
